General.Name: CETC Digital Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: CETC Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. provides software and information technology services in China. It offers digital products, including high-end industrial control processing platform, safe computer platform, intelligent data processing platform, signal processing platform and other related software and hardware products; industry digitalization products, such as financial technology, digital water conservancy, digital transportation, smart medical and other industry digital solutions; and digital new infrastructure comprising modular container data center, and data center environmental function components, such as intelligent lifting work platform and intelligent busbar system. It serves government, education, finance, telecommunications, manufacturing, energy, and transportation industries. The company was formerly known as Shanghai East-China Computer Co.,Ltd. CETC Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Xin Caohejing International Business Ctr, Shanghai, China, 200233
